member.name: T:DepotDownloader.CDNClientPool
member.summary: CDNClientPool provides a pool of connections to CDN endpoints, requesting CDN tokens as needed

member.name: P:DepotDownloader.ProtoManifest.FileData.Chunks
member.summary: Gets the chunks that this file is composed of.

member.name: P:DepotDownloader.ProtoManifest.FileData.TotalSize
member.summary: Gets the total size of this file.

member.name: P:DepotDownloader.ProtoManifest.FileData.FileHash
member.summary: Gets the hash of this file.

member.name: P:DepotDownloader.ProtoManifest.ChunkData.ChunkID
member.summary: Gets the SHA-1 hash chunk id.

member.name: P:DepotDownloader.ProtoManifest.ChunkData.Checksum
member.summary: Gets the expected Adler32 checksum of this chunk.

member.name: P:DepotDownloader.ProtoManifest.ChunkData.CompressedLength
member.summary: Gets the compressed length of this chunk.

member.name: P:DepotDownloader.ProtoManifest.ChunkData.UncompressedLength
member.summary: Gets the decompressed length of this chunk.
